newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index little changed.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index little changed.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Wednesday closed little changed in higher trade, bourse sources said.
The market's 30-share index closed at 611.99 from 611.66 on Tuesday.
Trade volume was 888,493 dinars against 426,000 dinars previously.
Investment fund SPDIT was down n1.26 dinar to 40.62 dinars. BNA bank down 0.95 dinar to 30.72 dinars.
BIAT bank was up 0.68 dinar to 61.5 dinars. ($=0.97 dinar)
